title: Big
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 24 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile 20L
description: What's the biggest thing a young reader can think of? A house? A tree? A plane? A dinosaur? They are all featured in this adorable book. Repeated high-frequency words assist in decoding, and new vocabulary is introduced with one-to-one picture correspondence.
meta: big, bus, car, dinosaur, dog, elephant, house, plane, tree
Connect to prior knowledge to understand new information
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast information
Consonants : Associate the letter Bb with the /b/ sound
